job.title: Data Scientist
job.description:
Position Overview
AI and analytics give companies a once-in-a-generation opportunity to perform orders of magnitude better than ever before. In order to do so, our clients need new business models built from analyzing dynamically changing customer and business operations data to drive ideal business decisions.
A Data Scientist in Cognizant’s Data+ practice brings relevant context to complex data for business and IT for intelligent systems and human decisioning. They work within the domains of data management, business intelligence, descriptive analytics and advanced modeling. They will use a variety of machine learning and AI approaches to deliver better, faster, and smarter insights and intelligence to some of the world’s most successful businesses - our clients.
Work Authorization
Due to the nature of this position Cognizant cannot provide?sponsorship?for U.S. work authorization (including participation in a CPT/OPT program) for this role.
Location(s)
Data Scientists will be deployed to client offices,
, where you will work alongside other experienced Cognizant associates delivering technology solutions. Applicants must be willing to relocate. While we will attempt to honor candidate location preferences, business need and position availability will determine final location assignment.
Start Date(s)
Data Scientists will largely start in 2 cohorts;
or
. We will attempt to honor candidate summer start date preferences, business need and position availability will determine final start date assignment of June or August. Exact summer start dates will be communicated with enough time for you to plan effectively.
Why Choose Us?
Cognizant delivers solutions that draw upon the full power and scale of our associates. You will be supported by high-caliber?experts?and employ some of the most advanced and patented capabilities. Our associate’s diverse backgrounds offer varied perspectives and fuel new?ways of thinking. We encourage lively discussions which inspire better results for?our clients.
If you’re comfortable with ambiguity, excited by change, and excel through autonomy, we’d love to hear from you.
